section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Utility provider" means:
a public or private provider of electricity, gas, water, wastewater, solid waste collection, or similar service; or
a provider of communications services involving the transmission, conveyance, or routing of voice, data, audio, video, or any other information or signals, to a point, or between or among points, by or through an electronic, radio, satellite, cable, optical, microwave, or other medium or method in existence now or in the future, regardless of the protocol used for transmission.
"Utility provider" includes cable service, Internet access service, voice over Internet service, telephone or wireless telephone service, and other similar providers.

text.section: Notwithstanding any provision of this article to the contrary, a waiver of customer liability is not considered insurance for purposes of this article.
